heading: Tuesday Night
text: Snow, mainly light; maybe some wintry mix southwest.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mainly morning snow showers northeast, slowly tapering off.
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, north to south

heading: Thursday, Christmas Day
temperature: Mid 20s to mid 30s, north to south

heading: Friday
temperature: Single digits to lower teens north, mid teens to lower 20s south
